name: df-hfsum
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(chfs, cmpo(s0, s1, co(cc, cmap, chba), co(cc, cmap, chba), cmpt(s2, chba, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), caddc, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
comment: Define the sum of two Hilbert space functionals. Definition of [Beran] p. 111. Note that unlike some authors, we define a functional as any function from ` ~H ` to ` CC ` , not just linear (or bounded linear) ones. (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
